thread.section_title: Hotel Baume - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Gem of a place.
thread.title_full: Gem of a place. - Review of Hotel Baume, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mark W
title: Gem of a place.
text:
My wife and I have just returned from a wonderful long weekend in Paris to celebrate her 40th birthday.
I couldn't have chosen a better hotel.
Hidden away from the bustling traffic this gem of a hotel is elegantly decorated and as clean and bright as a new penny.
Staffed by what I can only describe as the most pleasant and helpful people you could possibly wish to meet.
Thank you for making our first ever visit to Paris so special.
